SEMIFINALISTS ARE HERE” font_line_height=”1″][/split_line_heading][vc_column_text]With over 1,100 total applicants in the competition, we’re proud to announce the Top 20 startups that have been chosen to pitch live at Slush. These startups were reviewed and scored by Accel, General Catalyst, Lightspeed, NEA, and Northzone.

Here’s a list of the Top 20 companies in the world’s most coveted startup competition. the $650B global circular economy trade industry. We provide end-to-end traceability and certification across the waste value chain, addressing the unique needs of small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) in the global trade of secondary raw commodities.
